titles: Foure sermons vvherein is made a foure-fold discovery viz. of ecclesiasticall selfe-seeking, a wisemans carriage in evill times, the benefit of Christian patience, the right nature and temper of the spirit of the Gospel / by Edvvard Symons ...
author: Symmons, Edward.
publisher: Printed by R.C. for Andrew Crooke ...,
notes: Each sermon has separate title page.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
